## Compliance Coverage

### International Data Protection

**GDPR (European Union)**
- Full compliance with all user rights
- Right to access
- Right to rectification
- Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
- Right to data portability
- Right to object
- Rights related to automated decision-making

**CCPA/CPRA (California)**
- Complete consumer rights coverage
- Right to know
- Right to delete
- Right to opt-out of sale/sharing
- Right to correct inaccurate information
- Right to limit use of sensitive personal information

**Indian IT Act 2000**
- SPDI (Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules compliance
- CERT-In directions compliance
- Data localization considerations

**Consumer Protection Act 2019 (India)**
- Full consumer rights implementation
- E-commerce rules compliance
- Dispute resolution mechanisms

### Industry Security Standards

**SOC 2 Type II**
- Security commitments
- Availability commitments
- Processing integrity
- Confidentiality
- Privacy practices

**ISO 27001**
- Information security management practices
- Risk assessment procedures
- Security controls implementation
- Continuous improvement framework

**HIPAA (Healthcare)**
- Available for healthcare projects
- Business Associate Agreement (BAA) required
- Enhanced security measures
- Breach notification procedures

### International Consumer Laws

**EU Consumer Rights Directive**
- 14-day cooling-off period
- Right to withdraw from distance contracts
- Clear information requirements
- Refund processing timelines

**UK Consumer Rights Act 2015**
- Service quality standards
- Digital content rights
- Unfair terms protection

**FTC Guidelines (USA)**
- Truth in advertising
- Fair business practices
- Consumer protection standards
- Online commerce guidelines

**State-Specific Laws**
- Virginia CDPA (Consumer Data Protection Act)
- Colorado CPA (Privacy Act)
- Connecticut CTDPA (Data Privacy Act)
- Other emerging state privacy laws

## Cross-Reference Structure

All legal documents properly reference each other for comprehensive coverage:

### From Terms of Service:
- References Privacy Policy for data handling
- References Cancellation & Refund Policy for refund terms
- Links to Support page for contact information

### From Privacy Policy:
- References Terms of Service for service conditions
- References Cancellation & Refund Policy for account closure
- Explains how policies work together

### From Cancellation & Refund Policy:
- References Terms of Service for service definitions
- References Privacy Policy for data retention after cancellation
- Provides complete refund framework
